name: Custom branding Microg name
description: Rename the MicroG app to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: Application Name of MicroG
options.description: The name of the MicroG it will show on your home screen.

name: Custom branding icon Revancify blue
description: Changes the MicroG launcher icon to Revancify Blue.

name: Custom branding icon Revancify red
description: Changes the MicroG launcher icon to Revancify Red.

name: Custom package name
description: Specifies the package name for YouTube and YT Music in the MicroG build.

options.title: Package Name of YouTube
options.description: The package name of the YouTube. (NON-ROOT user only)

options.title: Package Name of YouTube Music
options.description: The package name of the YouTube Music. (NON-ROOT user only)

name: custom-branding-microg-mmt
description: Changes the MicroG launcher icon to MMT.
